definitions.example: Important types of property include real property (land), personal property (other physical possessions), and intellectual property (rights over artistic creations, inventions, etc.).

definitions.definition: A piece of real estate, such as a parcel of land.
definitions.example: There is a large house on the property.

definitions.definition: Real estate; the business of selling houses.
definitions.example: He works in property as a housing consultant.

definitions.definition: The exclusive right of possessing, enjoying and disposing of a thing.
An attribute or abstract quality associated with an individual, object or concept.
definitions.example: Charm is his most endearing property.

definitions.definition: An attribute or abstract quality which is characteristic of a class of objects.
definitions.example: Matter can have many properties, including color, mass and density.

definitions.definition: An editable or read-only parameter associated with an application, component or class, or the value of such a parameter.
definitions.example: You need to set the debugging property to "verbose".

definitions.definition: (usually in the plural) A prop, an object used in a dramatic production.
definitions.example: Costumes and scenery are distinguished from property properly speaking.
